attributes.action: Rewrite the Dangerous dog act of 1871 and 1989 and 2023 abolish added BSL
attributes.additional_details:
We want licences for all dog breeds and owners 
All dogs should be microchipped and kept on a lead in built-up public places
All owners have liability insurance 
Give the police power to fine owners for dog-on-dog attacks 
Make it a criminal offence and jail time for owners of dogs that cause the death of another person 
Make dog breeders fully  licensed and yearly checked by RSPCA or similar Government bodies 
Stop the imports of dogs and puppies from none UK territories
attributes.background:
Rewrite the Dangerous dog act of 1871 1989 -2023 in favour for a more up to date legislation and abolish added BSL ellement 
Bring in dog licences for all breeds and breeders in the UK and stop animal /puppy imports 
Make it a criminal offence to breed any dog without a breeders licence
